description:
Otohime`s terrifying plot that involves all of Edo finally enters its final stage. Gintoki, Katsura, Shinpachi, Kagura and the others make every effort to stop her plans… How will this battle end? And what will be the fate of Earth?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Be as Straightforward as Your Back Is Bent
Koshi wa Magatte mo Massugu ni
腰は曲がってもまっすぐに
